# lecture de fichiers


## id√©e 2




```{r}
start <- "2020-01-01"
end <- "2024-12-31"
path <- "exam_data"
```





```{r}
data <- list.files(path = path)
```



```{r}
years <- c("2020.csv", "2021.csv", "2022.csv", "2023.csv", "2024.csv")
moi <- c("01",  "02",  "03",  "04",  "05",  "06",  "07",  "08",  "09",  "10", "11", "12")
res <- c()
for (i in years){
  for (j in moi) {
      res <- append(res,data[endsWith(data, suffix = paste(j, i, sep = "-"))])
  }
}
```



```{r}
res
```



```{r}
  data_to_read <- res
  df <- fread(data_to_read[1])
  df <- data.frame(df)
  for (i in 2:length(data_to_read)){
    df_temp <- fread(data_to_read[i])
    df_temp <- data.frame(df_temp)
    
    # on peut ajouter ses lignes a df
    df <- rbind(df, df_temp)
    
  }
```



```{r}
endsWith(data, suffix = "01-2020.csv")]
```
